column2: The Imperial Tiger Guard is short handed. It is time to select more candidates from amongst the gentry.
The Emperor has identified one of your men as an ideal candidate for the Imperial Tiger Guards. Do you approve of letting your man go?
A provincial candidate has come seeking position in our Tiger Guard. Should we make him an Imperial Tiger Guardsman?
A provincial candidate has come before us to serve the Emperor. Should we make him an Imperial Tiger Guardsman?
It is time to designate a new Captain of your Imperial Guard. Will you accept this man?
